ViewObject.Name: GetCraEmailIdByContactIdView
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT email_cra.email_address cra_email_address,contact_id
FROM ar_contacts_v con,
(SELECT phone_country_code country_code, phone_area_code area_code,
phone_number, phone_extension extension, primary_flag,
primary_by_purpose, status, orig_system_reference,
contact_point_id phone_id,
contact_point_id cust_contact_point_id, contact_point_type,
owner_table_id, email_address, email_format,
contact_point_purpose
FROM hz_contact_points
WHERE owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
AND status = 'A'
AND contact_point_type = 'EMAIL'
AND contact_point_purpose = 'SICD_CRA_EMAIL'
ORDER BY primary_flag DESC) email_cra
WHERE 1 = 1 AND email_cra.owner_table_id = con.rel_party_id
and contact_id = :pContactId
